metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17624 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: "" In X.Org X Server 1.20.4, there is a stack-based buffer overflow in the function XQueryKeymap. For example, by sending ct.c_char 1000 times, an attacker can cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact. Note: It is disputed if the X.Org X Server is involved or if there is a stack overflow.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> this issue is likely to be disputed as of 2020-08-31, there is no indication this is actually a real issue. Marking as not-affected.

criterions.comment: xorg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
